name: Sudden Market Demo
description:
Play the game on steam! (Demo also available) Demo specifications:
  • The demo has a custom level.
  • Contains a tutorial.
  • The demo has an easier variation of the intermediate security guard.
  • A part of the supermaket is unreachable, unlock it by buying the game.
Gameplay:

Sudden Market is a first person action game that takes place after the closing of a supermarket. For each level you have a unique shopping list, hurry up and complete it in the given time without getting caught by the security guard! Special products will appear on the ground, collect them to be able to dash, run away and push the other shopping carts!

(Special products)

Levels:

The full game contains 12 unique levels. You can of course play them again as many times as you want and keep track of your best time (comparison displayed in game)! Depending on your best time you will have a higher or lower score that you can see in the main menu (the best scores are very difficult to reach)!

(86 product types and over 250 different models!)

Additional informations:
  • You can change the language, sound volume, graphics quality and key bindings in the settings.
  • There is an in-game tutorial.
  • There are additional obstacles in some levels.
  • Security guards have 3 levels; easy, intermediate and difficult.

Enjoy the game!
